wikipedia_page.main: Christopher James McCready (born 5 September 1981, Ellesmere Port, England) is an English footballer, currently without a club. He is able to play in right, left and central defence. Chris in his later years didn't quite fulfil his earlier potential an dropped 19 leagues to West Cheshire 3 with capenhurst villa reserves. He did however win clubman of the year in 2019.
